name: Cinerarium (of Solaris)
description:
Cinerarium (of Solaris) is a short magical realism game about two very different approaches to the creative process. The game was created in the https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy game maker.

The third sub-game, found towards the end of this game, is a de-make of https://ianmaclarty.itch.io/catacombs-of-solaris.

Bar SK (https://barsk.com.au/) is located on Smith Street, Melbourne, Australia.

While the locations and people in this game are real, the events depicted are not necessarily so.

Controls:

Arrow-keys or wasd to move and interact.
